titleStmt.title: The araignement & burning of Margaret Ferne-seede for the murther of her late husband Anthony Ferne-seede, found deade in Peckham Field neere Lambeth, hauing once before attempted to poyson him with broth, being executed in S. Georges-field the last of Februarie. 1608

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by E. Allde] for Henry Gosson, and are to be solde at the signe of the sunne in Pater-noster-rowe,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
